materials.raw_text: O: 24 grams, Pr: 16 grams, Ru: 8 grams, Sr: 4 grams

sourcing.instructions: O: Obtain from a chemical supplier or online marketplace; Pr: Purchase from a reputable laboratory supplier; Ru: Source from a precious metals dealer; Sr: Acquire from a specialty chemical store.
steps: O: Obtain from a chemical supplier or online marketplace; Pr: Purchase from a reputable laboratory supplier; Ru: Source from a precious metals dealer; Sr: Acquire from a specialty chemical store.

1. Measure 24 grams of Oxygen (O) in a fume hood. 2. Measure 16 grams of Praseodymium (Pr) and add to a mixing container. 3. Add 8 grams of Ruthenium (Ru) to the container. 4. Finally, add 4 grams of Strontium (Sr). 5. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture into a fine powder, ensuring even distribution of all components.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure 24 grams of Oxygen (O) in a fume hood. 2. Measure 16 grams of Praseodymium (Pr) and add to a mixing container. 3. Add 8 grams of Ruthenium (Ru) to the container. 4. Finally, add 4 grams of Strontium (Sr). 5. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture into a fine powder, ensuring even distribution of all components.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixed powder into a crucible. 2. Heat in a furnace to 900°C. 3. Maintain this temperature for 2 hours to ensure proper synthesis of the material.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixed powder into a crucible. 2. Heat in a furnace to 900°C. 3. Maintain this temperature for 2 hours to ensure proper synthesis of the material.

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool to room temperature naturally. 2. This process should take approximately 4-6 hours.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow the crucible to cool to room temperature naturally. 2. This process should take approximately 4-6 hours.

steps: 1. Remove the solidified material from the crucible. 2. Sand the edges to achieve a smooth finish. 3. Optionally, apply a sealant for added protection against moisture. 4. Allow the sealant to cure for 24 hours before handling.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the solidified material from the crucible. 2. Sand the edges to achieve a smooth finish. 3. Optionally, apply a sealant for added protection against moisture. 4. Allow the sealant to cure for 24 hours before handling.
